title: 'Disney' family of five 'disappears.' Then cops smell stench at luxury condo
itunes:title: 'Disney' family of five 'disappears.' Then cops smell stench at luxury condo
description:
Connecticut physical therapist Anthony Todt is accused of killing his entire family, along with the family dog. After police find Todt in his Disney area townhome with the dead bodies of his wife, dog, and three young children, he allegedly admits to the murders.

Joining Nancy Grace to discuss:

  • Darryl Cohen: Former Assistant District Attorney, Fulton County, Georgia
  • Steven Lampley: Former Detective, Author of “Outside Your Door”
  • Dr Bethany Marshall: Psychoanalyst, Beverly Hills
  • Dr. Michelle Dupre: South Carolina Medical Examiner & Author of “Homicide Investigation Field Guide”
  • Leigh Egan: Investigative Reporter , CrimeOnline.com 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
